entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:13 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
